name: PP Network
slogan: Helping people and brands build their social media presence
description: The PP Network is providing a service which is helping people and brands build their social media presence by giving them access to extremely valuable knowledge materials and facilitating their collaboration.

team.name: Nikolay Papazov
team.bioHtml: Currently a student at the University of Manchester, part of the biggest finance society MUTIS and the founder of a fast-growing social media agency.

jobs.title: Social Media Marketing intern
jobs.description:
At the PP Network, we're looking for ambitious, proactive and highly motivated individuals, who are willing to roll up their sleeves and get the job done!

We're looking for someone to join our marketing team, and help develop new growth strategies in order to attract more customers. 

Role:
- Create content for our newsletter and find good strategies to distribute it
- Design and run campaigns to test various marketing channels 
- Work closely with the co-founders and the rest of the team

Opportunity: 
- Flexible hours, depending on the job that you need to get done
- Work remotely from your laptop/telephone

Requirements:
- Undergraduate degree in communications, marketing, advertising, public relations, media studies, business and/or related fields. 
- Understanding of popular social networks – design, functionality, users 
- Excellent verbal, written, and presentation skills.
